feed.title: Reminder: Second BIP process meeting tomorrow at 23:00 UTC

entry.title: Reminder: Second BIP process meeting tomorrow at 23:00 UTC
entry.summary: A second BIP process meeting will take place on Wednesday, September 29th at 23:00 UTC, which is the morning of September 30th in Asia Pacific. The meeting will be held on the #bitcoin-dev Libera IRC channel. A summary of the first meeting can be found in the link provided [1]. Michael Folkson has shared his contact details including email, Keybase and PGP key.
